naslov: Split, kuća s dva stana i bazenom (prodaja)
opis: Jedinstvena prilika – kuća s dva stana, bazenom i uhodanim turističkim poslovanjem u Splitu Novo u ponudi – prodaja uhodanog turističkog poslovanja! U mirnom dijelu Splita, na predjelu Dujmovača, smjestila se ova moderno uređena kuća s bazenom, sunčalištem i uređenom okućnicom, idealna za nastavak uspješnog turističkog poslovanja. Ova nekretnina pruža sve što je potrebno za ugodan život ili unosan najam – komforne stambene jedinice, potpuno opremljene interijere, privatnost i opuštajući mediteranski ambijent. Kuća nudi: • 160 m² stambene površine • Dva odvojena, potpuno opremljena stana • Prostranu okućnicu od 278 m² • Bazen sa sunčalištem i terasom za druženje • Dječje igralište • Dva parkirna mjesta Raspored i oprema: U prizemlju se nalazi dvosoban stan, savršen za opuštanje i uživanje u ljetnim danima. Sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, kupaonice, dodatnog WC-a te otvorenog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom. Iz dnevnog prostora izlazi se na terasu s bazenom, gdje možete provoditi bezbrižne trenutke s obitelji i prijateljima. Na prvom katu smješten je trosoban stan, jednako prostran i udoban. Ima tri spavaće sobe, kupaonicu, dodatni WC, ulazni hodnik te veliki dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom. Iz dnevnog dijela izlazi se na balkon s pogledom na okućnicu. Dodatne prednosti: • Podno grijanje u kupaonicama i dnevnom prostoru pruža dodatni komfor tijekom cijele godine • Kuća je pod videonadzorom, osiguravajući sigurnost i privatnost • Prodaje se potpuno namještena i spremna za nastavak turističkog najma Izvrsna investicija: Ova nekretnina već ostvaruje visoke godišnje prihode od turističkog najma, a stabilna popunjenost jamči brz povrat ulaganja. Cijena: 999.000,00 € Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za dodatne informacije i dogovor oko razgledavanja, možete me kontaktirati na: Tonka Tomić Telefon: +385 91 534 9959 E-mail: t.tomic@remax.hr Razgledavanje i dodatne informacije dostupni su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom, u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Savršen spoj modernog komfora, privatnosti i izvrsnog potencijala za ulaganje – ne propustite ovu priliku! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Unique opportunity – house with two apartments, swimming pool and established tourism business in Split New in offer – sale of established tourism business! In a quiet part of Split, in the Dujmovača area, this modernly decorated house with a swimming pool, sundeck and landscaped garden is located, ideal for continuing a successful tourism business. This property offers everything you need for a pleasant life or a profitable rental – comfortable residential units, fully equipped interiors, privacy and a relaxing Mediterranean ambiance. The house offers: • 160 m² of living space • Two separate, fully equipped apartments • Spacious garden of 278 m² • Swimming pool with sundeck and terrace for socializing • Children's playground • Two parking spaces Layout and equipment: On the ground floor there is a two-bedroom apartment, perfect for relaxing and enjoying summer days. It consists of an entrance hall, two spacious bedrooms, a bathroom, an additional toilet and an open living room with a kitchen and dining room. The living area opens onto a terrace with a swimming pool, where you can spend carefree moments with family and friends. On the first floor is a three-bedroom apartment, equally spacious and comfortable. It has three bedrooms, a bathroom, an additional toilet, an entrance hall and a large living room with a kitchen and dining area. The living area opens onto a balcony overlooking the garden. Additional advantages: • Underfloor heating in the bathrooms and living area provides additional comfort throughout the year • The house is under video surveillance, ensuring security and privacy • It is being sold fully furnished and ready to continue as a tourist rental Excellent investment: This property already generates high annual income from tourist rentals, and stable occupancy guarantees a quick return on investment. Price: €999,000.00 The buyer pays the agency fee. For additional information and to arrange a viewing, you can contact me at: Tonka Tomić Phone: +385 91 534 9959 E-mail: t.tomic@remax.hr Viewing and additional information are available after signing the Agency Agreement with the Agency, in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. The perfect combination of modern comfort, privacy and excellent investment potential - don't miss this opportunity!
